TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallerCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 包含要在安装过程中运行的安装程序的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的方法和属性的应用程序需要管理一系列对象。The provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of objects. 使用任何将安装程序添加到集合的以下三种方法：Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection: - 方法将单个安装程序添加到集合。The method adds a single installer to the collection. - 方法向集合添加多个安装程序。The methods add multiple installers to the collection. - 方法和属性，它是索引器，每个将单个安装程序添加到集合中的指定索引处。The method and the property, which is the indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index. 删除安装程序通过方法。Remove installers through the method. 检查安装程序是否在集合中使用方法。Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the method. 找到安装程序集合中定位使用方法。Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the method. 集合中的安装程序，将运行安装程序包含由指定的集合属性，将调用其， ， ，或方法。The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the property, calls their , , , or methods. 安装程序集合的用法的示例，请参阅和类。For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the and classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的类。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 此示例提供了类似于实现[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 它使用前面的该特定程序集的选项安装的程序集。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果没有为程序集指定一个选项上, 一个程序集的选项会在列表中的上一个程序集时使用。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果"/ u"或"/uninstall"指定选项，卸载程序集。If the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果"/？"If the "/?" 或"/help"提供选项，则向控制台显示帮助信息。or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CPP/installercollection_add.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CS/installercollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/VB/installercollection_add.vb#1)]
